testcase.name: As a user I can search by product SKU
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am on the home page✅ When I search by product sku✅ Then I shall verify the ProductName and Price is displayed

testcase.name: As a user I can search for stores near me
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am on the home page✅ When I search for stores and by zipcode✅ Then I shall see Stores near 19152

testcase.name: As a user I can search By Brands
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am on the home page✅ When I search by brand name✅ Then I can select category, sub category, then slect a name and verify the url

testcase.name: As a user I can search by Department
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am on the home page✅ When I search by store department⚠️ Then I can select the Product and verify its price

testcase.name: As a user I can search by product
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am on the home page✅ When I search for products, apply filter and validate results
